Name: Good Guy Card
About the game: This game is a adv game.says that player go to university and try to find his best lover's story. You can play this game as a beauty. You task is to change a classmate to be you husband. You can chose different item to change good sensitivity. And at last you will find who is really loving you. In this game,you will receive many choice,and each choice will change the development of game. And you also can see many beautiful images and roles in this game.
